alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Cameron; Hidalgo; Jim Hogg; Kenedy; Starr; Willacy; Zapata (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued November 21 at 10:26PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY. THE KYLE POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR JORDYN WEBBER-DANIELS, WHITE, FEMALE, 6 YEARS OLD, 3 feet, 50 pounds, BLONDE HAIR, HAZEL EYES, LAST SEEN WEARING LONG SLEEVE DARK BLUE/PURPLE SHIRT, GRAY LEGGINGS AND BLACK SHOES AND JAYLYNN WEBBER-DANIELS, WHITE, FEMALE, 6 YEARS OLD, 3 feet, 50 pounds, BROWN HAIR, BLUE EYES, LAST SEEN WEARING LONG SLEEVE SHIRT WITH A UNICORN, SHORTS, AND BABY YODA SHOES. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR KYLEI GLASGOW, 20 YEARS OLD, WHITE, FEMALE, 5 feet 2 inches, 110 pounds, BLONDE HAIR, HAZEL EYES, LAST SEEN WEARING UNKNOWN CLOTHING, IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR ABDUCTION. THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING A GOLD, 2010, TOYOTA, HIGHLANDER BEARING TEXAS LICENSE PLATE NUMBER 9 D V 2 3 9 0. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST SEEN IN KYLE, TEXAS. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THIS CHILD TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE KYLE POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 5 1 2 2 6 8 3 2 3 2. NEWS MEDIA POINT OF CONTACT IS KYLE POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 5 1 2 2 6 8 3 2 3 2.
